showScoreExcerpt: “You can sit and observe the show all around you or you can pay to hit the orchestra floor and party with the Marcoses. Whee!...At no more than 100 minutes long, ‘Here Lies Love’ never over-indulges nor does it lose the audience’s attention for a moment. “
